greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of array A187360: minimal polynomials of 2*cos(Pi/n) evaluated for x=1.
formula: a(n) = C(n,x=1), with the minimal (monic and integer) polynomial C(n,x) of 2*cos(Pi/n).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 14 2011
